original_title: The Divided Trail: A Native American Odyssey
overview: The Divided Trail: A Native American Odyssey is a 1978 American short documentary film directed by Jerry Aronson. Filmed over eight years, this chronicles the personal and political hardships faced by three Chippewa Indians. It was nominated in 1978 for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short.
title: The Divided Trail: A Native American Odyssey
